summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3964 for the improvement of Rainier Avenue from Hudson Street to 42nd Avenue South; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48252, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
